item.title: Random
item.dc:creator: @Hellz_Scape Hellz Scape
item.description:
@Hellz_Scape wrote:

In crafting how would I make it so that sometimes you break your gem and don’t get it. That would be to make an uncut diamond in to a cut diamond
[Crushed gemstone is 1633]

if ((itemUsed == 1617 || otherItem == 1617) && (itemUsed == 1755 || otherItem == 1755)) { crafting(750, 1617, 1601, 70); }
